hero.title: About us
hero.content: Tinacon Limited is a strategic branding agency focused on brand creation, rebrands, and brand transformations. We partner with companies to create powerful and engaging brand experiences that connect with customers and drive business growth.

story.title: Making credit history with nightcard
story.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
